title: ICD-10 Lookup Service
description:
ICD-10 Diagnosis Code Lookup Service with Caching and Autocomplete

Build a service to look up ICD-10 diagnosis codes that provides fast autocomplete suggestions and caches results for improved performance.

Requirements:
- Create a service class/module for ICD-10 code lookups
- Implement autocomplete functionality that searches by code or description
- Add caching layer to store frequently accessed codes and reduce API/database calls
- Support both exact code lookups (e.g., "E11.9") and partial text searches (e.g., "diabetes")
- Return standardized results including code, full description, and category
- Configure cache expiration policy appropriate for medical reference data
- Handle invalid codes gracefully with clear error messages
- Ensure case-insensitive search functionality
- Implement rate limiting if using external ICD-10 API
- Add proper error handling for network failures or missing data

Technical Considerations:
- Choose appropriate caching strategy (in-memory, Redis, etc.) based on dataset size
- Determine ICD-10 data source (local database, third-party API, flat file)
- Optimize autocomplete for sub-200ms response time
- Consider data freshness requirements for ICD-10 updates
- Add unit tests for search accuracy and cache hit rates
- Document API interface for consuming applications

Success Criteria:
- Autocomplete returns relevant results within 200ms
- Cache hit rate above 70% for common lookups
- Supports minimum 10,000 ICD-10 codes
- Handles concurrent requests efficiently
